info.p: This is a stand-in for when a centre wishes to declare that it accepts certain kinds of source code or discourages certain kinds of submissions of this nature. A recommendation using this "hub format" must be accompanied by a comment.

As is usual with hub formats, centres are strongly encouraged to, firstly, check if the programming or query language code they wish to reference is among the formats already described in the SIS or formats that await getting described.
